thread.title: SYLVIA S HAYSLETT
thread.title_full: Superior Van and Mobility reviewed by SYLVIA S HAYSLETT

author: SYLVIA S HAYSLETT
title: SYLVIA S HAYSLETT
text: The process of buying this handicap accessible van was an awesome experience. All the staff were very courteous and helpful. I can not say enough about Ed Combs. He is very courteous and most of all honest. We love the van and everything Ed told us, well that is the way it is. We have absolutely have no complaints. I am sure we will have many years of good service from this vehicle. When we were unable to come pick it up as planned due to illness, Ed brought it to us!!! Thanks Ed for everything.
